thread.title: Good quality, well-located hotel for the city tour
thread.title_full: Good quality, well-located hotel for the city tour - Review of Holiday Inn Paris - Notre Dame, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Gergo0304
title: Good quality, well-located hotel for the city tour
text:
The hotel is perfectly located in the Latin Quarter, a few minutes' walk from the Cite (Notre Dame, Sainte-Chapelle ...). The nearest metro station is about 50 m!
We were on the sixth floor of a room with a balcony with a beautiful view over the roofs of Paris and the Eiffel Tower. The room was clean, comfortable, quiet and well equipped. Only the mini bar was missing. The staff is friendly and attentive.
The usual rich buffet of hot and cold dishes.
The rooftop terrace with stunning views.
Gladly recommend it for couples who come to visit the city.
Room Tip: From the rooms on the sixth floor and above, there is panorama to city See more room tips
